name: Exodus (itch) (GuardianGames)
description:
DISCOVER THE SECRETS OF THE PYRAMID

A lonely man waking up trapped in a strange pyramid. His memories left him, but the truth awaits for his arrival. Exodus is a puzzle and narrative game in which you will unravel the mysteries behind Egypt's fate.

FEATURES

- A narrative journey through the thoughts of a lost traveller, dialogues with the characters populating the pyramid and environmental storytelling.

- Puzzles challenging the player to interact with the mysteries surrounding the locations.

- Surprises and twists along your path.

CREDITS

Game made by Raúl Pernía, Ricardo Cancela and Javier Llorente.
